articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: Aston Martin: Burning F1 seat that hurt Alonso a work in progress - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Aston Martin says the burning sensation Fernando Alonso felt in his seat during Formula 1's Qatar Grand Prix is a recurring issue that it is still trying to resolve.
articles.content:
Around the halfway mark of a sweltering Losail race, Alonso urged the team to come up with a solution after feeling a burning pain in his seat.
"The seat is burning, mate," he said on the team radio… [+2213 chars]
